item.title: How long does it take to reach a certain language level?
item.description:
How long does it take to reach a certain level?

||classes|minimum study hours|total| |—|—|—| |A0 - A1| 40-60 hrs | 20-40 hrs |60-100 hrs| |A1 - A2| 100-60 hrs | 30-60 hrs |100-200 hrs| |A2 - B1.1| 8 weeks | 10 weeks | 13 weeks| |B1.1 - B1.2| 8 weeks | 10 weeks | |B1.2 - B2.1|8 weeks |10 weeks| |B2.1 - B2.2|8 weeks |10 weeks|
